category.name: wbb.threadAdd
category.item: A quick search shows that there are one or more similar threads to yours. Click here to show them.
A quick search shows that there are one or more similar threads to yours. Please check if they match with yours and avoid double posting.

category.name: wbb.thread.quickSearch
category.item: Click here to view the complete search result

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter words which should be ignored when searching for threads. This can heavily improve the search results.
Show time of the last post
Choose, whether the number of replies should be shown.
Choose whether the time of the last post should be shown instead of the thread time.
Choose whether the thread start time should be shown.
Choose how the search result should be displayed to the user.
Choose whether the search result or only an information box should be shown. The information box can be extended to show the search result.
Activate this option if you want the quick search to display a link to the complete search result.
Activate this option if you want to limit the quick search to the current board.
Choose how many threads should be displayed to the user.
Choos which boards should be ignored by the thread quick search.

You can choose from 3 quick search types:
  1. Fulltext search: This search matches against every post.
  2. Thread search: This search matches against the first post of every thread.
  3. Topic search: This search matches only against the thread title.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: This group can use the thread quick search while startting threads. This can be disabled for experienced user groups.

category.name: wcf.user.option
category.item: Activate thits option if you want the board software to perform a quick search on your thread title on creating new threads.
